Crisp Review

about

My name is Sam and I love crisps. On this website I review the crisps I have eaten. All the crisps I review on this blog are vegan. I hope you enjoy reading what I have written.

  • McCoy's - Epic Eats - Spicy Salsa

    Starting the new year with a bang! McCoy’s crisps are always a winner and these are no different. The marketing material for ‘Epic Eats’ claims they pack a punch, have that signature crunch, and are irresistable. I’m not sure about all that but these are a good crisp. They’re the...

    Seabrook x Aunt Bessie’s - Roast Potato & Black Pepper Another Seabrooks offering today. This time, one from their ‘collaboration’ with Aunt Bessie’s. Aunt Bessie’s have also made some beer with Northern Monk. I’m not sure what they’re up to but I don’t like it. Stick with the frozen yorkshires...

    Continue reading...
